alert.note: Alert for Jeff Davis; Presidio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 25 at 3:54PM CDT until May 25 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Jeff Davis County in southwestern Texas... North central Presidio County in southwestern Texas... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 354 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Valentine, or 28 miles west of Fort Davis, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bloys Camp, McDonald Observatory, Davis Mountains State Park and Indian Lodge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
